column1: Amarpatan is a town and a nagar panchayat in Satna district in the state of Madhya Pradesh

Amarpatan is located at 24.32°N 80.98°E﻿ / 24.32; 80.98. It has an average elevation of 358 metres (1174 feet). Multiple villages surround the town. It is on National Highway No.7 and connects Rewa to Maihar.
There is an old Garhi in town which was built by the Lodhi community in ancient times. There is a Jagannath Swami temple inside the Garhi.
